name: VideoSourceOptions
description: The type of resource used for video textures. This is typically an HTMLVideoElement. / export type VideoResource = HTMLVideoElement; /** Options for video sources.

properties.name: autoLoad
properties.description: If true, the video will start loading immediately.

properties.name: autoPlay
properties.description: If true, the video will start playing as soon as it is loaded.

properties.name: updateFPS
properties.description: The number of times a second to update the texture from the video. Leave at 0 to update at every render.

properties.name: crossorigin
properties.description: If true, the video will be loaded with the `crossorigin` attribute.

properties.name: loop
properties.description: If true, the video will loop when it ends.

properties.name: muted
properties.description: If true, the video will be muted.

properties.name: playsinline
properties.description: If true, the video will play inline.

properties.name: preload
properties.description: If true, the video will be preloaded.

properties.name: preloadTimeoutMs
properties.description: The time in milliseconds to wait for the video to preload before timing out.

properties.name: alphaMode
properties.description: The alpha mode of the video.

properties.name: autoLoad
properties.description: A texture source that uses a video as its resource. It automatically resizes the texture based on the video dimensions. It also provides methods to control playback and handle video events. This class supports automatic loading, playback, and frame updates. It can also handle cross-origin videos and provides options for looping, muting, and inline playback. / export class VideoSource extends TextureSource<VideoResource> { public static extension: ExtensionMetadata = ExtensionType.TextureSource; /** The default options for video sources. */ public static defaultOptions: VideoSourceOptions = { ...TextureSource.defaultOptions, /** If true, the video will start loading immediately.

properties.name: playing
resource
